detail_desc: Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Long, wide jeans in sturdy denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, side and back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Long, wide jeans in sturdy denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, side and back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.

Set with a dress, pair of leggings and a hairband in a cotton blend. Dress in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder and a ribbed hem. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist. Hairband in jersey with a knot detail at the front.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a collar, V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a collar, V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a collar, V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a collar, V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a collar, V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Short cardigan knitted in a wool blend with block-coloured sections. V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trainers in suede and leather with mesh sections and lacing at the front. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Lace blouse with a small stand-up collar, opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves.
Lace blouse with a small stand-up collar, opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves.
Straight-cut shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, V-neck opening at the front, buttons down the front, 3/4-length, cuffed sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Straight-cut shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, V-neck opening at the front, buttons down the front, 3/4-length, cuffed sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Straight-cut shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, V-neck opening at the front, buttons down the front, 3/4-length, cuffed sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Trainers in velour with lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Boots in shiny leather with square toes, chunky heels and a knee-high shaft with loops at the top and a concealed zip in one side. Leather linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Dungarees in stretch twill with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a zipped chest pocket and real back pockets. Fake fly, a zip in one side and slim legs with a zip at the hems.
Skinny-fit dungarees in washed, superstretch denim with adjustable straps, a high waist, chest pocket, fake front pockets, real back pockets and a zip in one side.
Skinny-fit dungarees in washed, superstretch denim with adjustable straps, a high waist, chest pocket, fake front pockets, real back pockets and a zip in one side.
Skinny-fit dungarees in washed, superstretch denim with adjustable straps, a high waist, chest pocket, fake front pockets, real back pockets and a zip in one side.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and straight legs that taper gently to the hem with sewn-in turn-ups.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and straight legs that taper gently to the hem with sewn-in turn-ups.

Coat in a sturdy weave containing some wool with notch lapels and a concealed double-breasted fastening at the front. Concealed pockets in the side seams, a soft, detachable belt with a metal buckle, and a single back vent. Lined.
Pea coat in woven fabric with shiny metal buttons, notch lapels and jetted side pockets. Lined.

Longer-style jacket in woven fabric with a concealed double-breasted fastening at the front, notch lapels and a tie belt at the waist. Detachable tab with metal press-studs at the cuffs, and pockets in the side seams. Fitted with a gentle flare to the hem. Lined.
Leggings in printed cotton jersey with appliqués at the knees, an elasticated waist and fake front pockets.
Leggings in printed cotton jersey with appliqués at the knees, an elasticated waist and fake front pockets.
Short dress in an airy weave with a round neck that has pleats at the front and an opening with a button at the back. Pleated, 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Lined.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with elastication at the top, short sleeves with ties, and a rounded hem.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with elastication at the top, short sleeves with ties, and a rounded hem.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with elastication at the top, short sleeves with ties, and a rounded hem.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with elastication at the top, short sleeves with ties, and a rounded hem.
Top in soft linen and viscose jersey with short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Top in soft linen and viscose jersey with short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Fitted top in stretch organic cotton jersey with spaghetti shoulder straps and a V-neck with a discreet lace trim.
Fitted top in stretch organic cotton jersey with spaghetti shoulder straps and a V-neck with a discreet lace trim.
Fitted top in stretch organic cotton jersey with spaghetti shoulder straps and a V-neck with a discreet lace trim.
Wide, straight-cut T-shirt in cotton jersey with a yoke front and back, short sleeves with print stripes and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide, straight-cut T-shirt in cotton jersey with a yoke front and back, short sleeves with print stripes and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide, straight-cut T-shirt in cotton jersey with a yoke front and back, short sleeves with print stripes and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide, straight-cut T-shirt in cotton jersey with a yoke front and back, short sleeves with print stripes and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Dungaree shorts in soft, washed denim with hard-worn details that are patched on the inside. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, press-studs at the sides, a chest pocket, front and back pockets, and raw-edge hems. The cotton content of the dungaree shorts is partly recycled.

Dungaree shorts in washed, stretch denim with lightly worn details that are patched on the inside. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a flap chest pocket with a press-stud, press-studs at the sides and a fake fly. Front and back pockets, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sleeveless dress in satin with a scallop-edged neckline, and a gentle V-neck and visible zip at the back. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined bodice.
Sleeveless dress in satin with a scallop-edged neckline, and a gentle V-neck and visible zip at the back. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined bodice.
Hairband in jersey with a sewn-on knot-detail at the front.
Fitted vest top in stretch ribbed viscose jersey.
Fitted vest top in stretch ribbed viscose jersey.
Coat in jacquard-patterned jersey with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and welt side pockets. Unlined.
Bikini top with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups, ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.
Bikini top with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups, ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Fitted, long-sleeved, turtleneck top in airy jersey with a burnout pattern.
Dress in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a polo neck, long raglan sleeves and textured knit sections at the front.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams. Detachable hood with an elasticated front edge, press-studs down the front, a reflective detail on one sleeve, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams. Detachable hood with an elasticated front edge, press-studs down the front, a reflective detail on one sleeve, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and reflective details. Elastication at the back of the waist, press-studs at the sides, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and reflective details. Elastication at the back of the waist, press-studs at the sides, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
STUDIO COLLECTION. 5-pocket jeans in slightly stretchy denim with a high waist, button fly and wide, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
STUDIO COLLECTION. 5-pocket jeans in slightly stretchy denim with a high waist, button fly and wide, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Long skirt in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and a coin pocket. High slits front and back and a contrasting colour selvedge at the hem.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Denim shirt with slightly wider peak lapels and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, press-studs at the cuffs and a straight-cut hem.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Denim shirt with slightly wider peak lapels and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, press-studs at the cuffs and a straight-cut hem.
